description.displayText: Love love love her. She's been helping to watch my little one whenever our schedules work together. She's a sweetheart. Punctual and kind. I wish I could book her every single weekend. Def rehire.
description.originalText: Love love love her. She's been helping to watch my little one whenever our schedules work together. She's a sweetheart. Punctual and kind. I wish I could book her every single weekend. Def rehire.

description.displayText: Shadya was a God send to our family. I found Shadya when Covid first hit and schools were closing down. At the time my children were 3,4, and 8 which meant I needed not only someone who could help assist my 3 year old, who was use to a daycare environment, but my school aged children who needed help with class work. I still had to work so finding someone who was dependable with my work schedule and someone who was trustworthy with my children seemed impossible. Shadya was the 3rd person I had tried and I was feeling a little worried if she didn't work out. Thankfully she came in and was a perfect fit! She was able to balance my younger child, who I will say can be a handful, along with assisting my older two with their virtual classes and even helping them better understand work that they were struggling with. My kids adored her and felt super comfortable around her. If she was still here in the Savannah area I would still be using her till this day.

description.displayText: We've worked with Shadya a couple times now, and it's been great. She's friendly, punctual, great with the kids, and even does a little extra when picking up/ cleaning up after the kids. We plan on working with her again.
description.originalText: We've worked with Shadya a couple times now, and it's been great. She's friendly, punctual, great with the kids, and even does a little extra when picking up/ cleaning up after the kids. We plan on working with her again.

description.displayText: Shadya is amazing! Not only is she punctual, she's proactive. On her first day, she reached out to let me know she could actually come in early. She's kind and patient. Our little one has stranger anxiety so he can be a handful. Despite this, he took to Shadya very quickly and enjoys spending time with her. She keeps him on schedule perfectly and takes excellent care of our son.
